step_feedback.feedback: Your arm is mostly overhead, but try to extend it a bit further. Keep those fingers open!
Good job stretching your arms back overhead. Remember to exhale as you relax.
You're making a fist and pushing down well. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and inhaling.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good work.
You're doing great with the overall movement. Continue to focus on the specific cues for each step.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to fully stretch your arms overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. Exhale as you relax and extend your arms back.
